channel.title: [v1.5][FREE] RCS - RuneScape Community Script (old RuneScape website remake)
channel.description:
[B]RCS comes with an installer![/B]
[B]Introduction:[/B] Well, I'm sure you're wondering what in the heck is RCS? RCS or RuneScape Community Script is a [I]free[/I] script that imitates RuneScape's 2006-08 website. It allows older era servers to add that next step of nostalgia; what's better than having a fully functional website just like it was when the server was made?
[B][SIZE=18pt](NOTICE 5/01/13) - VERSION 1.5 RELEASED![/SIZE][/B]
[B]Table of Contents[/B]
[ul][*]Current Features [*]Upcoming/Planned features [*]Download[/ul]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]LATEST RELEASE (V1.5)[/SIZE][/CENTER] [code] Changelog *Added infraction system (upon giving infraction, a message is sent to the user with details) *Offense page (users can view infractions they've received here) *Forum Profile pages added (might be buggy) [] *Added donation system; you have to manually set it up under the IPN folder, which includes adding your own donator button the donation page. -> also please note that the minimum donaton is set to $2.00 *Donors have different colored posts on forums ~~~~~~~ *Donors have a "donor" title under their username~~~~~ You can make people donators via the ACP in "Lookup user" *Donors have more BBCodes, such as the following: ~~~~ *When moderators escalate a thread, they can provide a reason *Administrators now have signatures. You can change/create a signature in the ACP homepage by clicking on the "change signature" button. *Fixed cookies not working properly on localhost [if you still encounter a problem regarding cookies (login/logout, etc), please PM me. [/code]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]FEATURES[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[b]Sample pictures[/b] http://puu.sh/2LcDw http://puu.sh/2LcEy http://puu.sh/2LcFH http://puu.sh/2LcG5
[ul][*]Fully functional message center [*]Infraction system [*]Offense page to review infractions [*]Forum profile pages [*]Moderation and Administration center [*]Fully functional forums [*]100% forum mutes [*]Easy-to-use forum reporting system, and easy design for the moderators [*]Well-designed moderation system for forum moderators [*]Story system [*]News System [*]Customizable settings [*]Easy installation [*]And of course, a lot more...[/ul]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]EASY INSTALLATION[/SIZE] [img]http://puu.sh/18oiP[/img]
[SIZE=5]PLANNED FEATURES[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[ul][*]None.[/ul]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]DOWNLOAD[/SIZE][/CENTER] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?zk2w2dc4wa2ewl2]Download RCS v1.5[/url]

item.title: [v1.5][FREE] RCS - RuneScape Community Script (old RuneScape website remake)
item.dc:creator: @get_a_life1 get_a_life
item.description:
@get_a_life1 wrote:

[quote=“bman7, post:231, topic:461430”]The statistics on the forum index aren’t showing up right:

As you can see, not all sections have been posted in, yet it says there’s 1 thread and 0 posts in all of them. The ones that do have posts, both have two threads, and one reply to a thread.
Also, the last post date isn’t updating correctly. The only files I have modified, is the sidebar links in index.php.

The statistics at the very bottom of the forum do work correctly.[/quote]

such a easy fix to do man
ill give you a hint the bug is in file Forum.index.php in the structure folder

Read full topic

item.title: [v1.5][FREE] RCS - RuneScape Community Script (old RuneScape website remake)
item.dc:creator: @bman7 bman7
item.description:
@bman7 wrote:

The statistics on the forum index aren’t showing up right:

As you can see, not all sections have been posted in, yet it says there’s 1 thread and 0 posts in all of them. The ones that do have posts, both have two threads, and one reply to a thread.
Also, the last post date isn’t updating correctly. The only files I have modified, is the sidebar links in index.php.

The statistics at the very bottom of the forum do work correctly.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SRBuckey5266 SRBuckey5266
item.description:
@SRBuckey5266 wrote:

RCS v1.5 released. Check the OP for download link.

Changelog for 1.4->1.5 *Added infraction system (upon giving infraction, a message is sent to the user with details) *Offense page (users can view infractions they've received here) *Forum Profile pages added (might be buggy) [] *Added donation system; you have to manually set it up under the IPN folder, which includes adding your own donator button the donation page. -> also please note that the minimum donaton is set to $2.00 *Donors have different colored posts on forums ~~~~~~~ *Donors have a "donor" title under their username~~~~~ You can make people donators via the ACP in "Lookup user" *Donors have more BBCodes, such as the following: ~~~~ *When moderators escalate a thread, they can provide a reason *Administrators now have signatures. You can change/create a signature in the ACP homepage by clicking on the "change signature" button. *Fixed cookies not working properly on localhost [if you still encounter a problem regarding cookies (login/logout, etc), please PM me.

Read full topic

item.title: [v1.5][FREE] RCS - RuneScape Community Script (old RuneScape website remake)
item.dc:creator: @SRBuckey5266 SRBuckey5266
item.description:
@SRBuckey5266 wrote:

[quote=“gilbo184, post:221, topic:461430”]where do i go next to actually open the website?

[/quote]

Upload it to your webhost, assuming you have one. Alternatively, you can download a program such as WAMPServer or XAMPP and run the website on your computer locally.

Anyways, about that 1.5…maybe I’ll get around to releasing it sometime.

Read full topic

item.title: [v1.5][FREE] RCS - RuneScape Community Script (old RuneScape website remake)
item.dc:creator: @SRBuckey5266 SRBuckey5266
item.description:
@SRBuckey5266 wrote:

Sub-Zero;3841445:

Found a privately developed version of RCS I’ve had for a while now; it includes a pretty nice infraction system (a lot of jQuery involved to make it smooth & easy to use), forum profiles, etc. I might just work on it a bit and make it a V1.5 release (even though RCS is discontinued).

As I said. ^


RCS 1.5 is pretty much a privately developed version I'm releasing.

New features in it:


[ul][*]Donator rank (can be given to a user)
[*]PayPal IPN system was added, but you'll have to edit it to your liking/details
[*]Infraction system
[*]Made a few changes to escalation system
[*]Forum profiles[/ul]


Small previews:

[img]http://puu.sh/2r94q[/img]

[b]Infraction system[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EtNoKKeiaWk&feature=youtu.be

[b]Escalation system now supports reasons[/b]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fmCyi47GJoM&feature=youtu.be

Read full topic
